lead_paragraph: KAYE--Judith S. With heartfelt sadness, the Trustees and Administration of Barnard College mourn the passing of the Honorable Judith S. Kaye '58, who was a devoted alumna, a Barnard Trustee from 1995 to 2002, and again from 2008 to 2009, an active trustee emerita, and a member of the Athena Center Board of Advisors. In 1987, she received the College's highest honor, the Barnard Medal of Distinction, and in 2010, the Frederick A.P. Barnard Award for all she has done for women, for the rights of the individual, and for her alma mater. Barnard honors the memory of this extraordinary woman and extends its deepest sympathies to her family. Jolyne Caruso-FitzGerald Chair, Board of Trustees Debora Spar, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAYE, JUDITH S
